ekspolanka mihikatha horawa samarayi“janatha ekamuthuෙwan wishwaya surakimu” yana prathignyawa samangin ekspolanka holdings hi karya mandalaya mewara mihikatha horawa samarimata ekwiya.mema swechcha wadasatahana mangin goliya deshaguna wiparyasayanta erehiwa janathawa pela gaswimata ekspolanka samuhaya da me anuwa athwal banda ganu atha.mahadwipa 7ka, ratawal ha deshabhumi 150ka, 7,000k pamana wana nagara ha sulu nagara kendra kara ganimin koti sankhyatha janathawak mewara 2013 mihikatha horawa samarima sandaha ekwuha.mema karyaya sandaha ekspolanka mulapurana ladde fesbuk samaja jalaya haraha kriyanwithayak aarambha karamini.
